newFeature.widgetDescription: Beautiful widgets to check the upcoming train scheduale.
newFeature.widgetGuide: Here's a quick set up guide with a few tips on how to get the full benefit from them.
newFeature.addStep1: 1. From the Home Screen, touch and hold a widget or an empty area until the apps jiggle..
newFeature.addStep2: 2. Tap the Add button (+) in the upper-left corner..
newFeature.addStep3: 3. Select Better Rail from the list, select the desired widget size and press "Add Widget ".
newFeature.configStep1: 1. Touch and hold a widget to open the quick actions menu.
newFeature.configStep3: 3. Select the stations for the widget, then tap outside the widget to exit.
newFeature.stackingIntro: In order to display 2 routes inside one widget (i.e. riding to work and back), you can create a widget stack.
newFeature.stackingStep1: 1. Touch and hold an area on your Home Screen until the apps jiggle.
newFeature.stackingStep2: 2. Drag a widget on top of another widget.
newFeature.stackingStep3: 3. Inside the stack you can scroll between the two widgets.
newFeature.stackingStep4: Tip: You can view the full train scheduale quickly by tapping on the widget.
newFeature.myCreator: My creator would like to say a few words.
newFeature.heyThere:
Hey there! 
I made Better Rail in hopes it'll make public transportation a little more accessible to the public. It's offered for free, without ads or trackers.
newFeature.pleaseConsider: Please consider helping it to reach a wider audience by giving a review in the App Store or sharing it with your friends ğŸ˜Š
